header.title: McDonald’s customer threw food at worker who got revenge by breaking her face with blender
header.postText: A McDonald’s customer was left with a shattered cheekbone and nose after a restaurant manager hurled a huge blender at her face.', 'Britany Price was struck hard on the face with the kitchen tool after hurling her order at the worker at the McDonald’s in Colerain Township, Ohio, on September 22.', 'Price, who has undergone surgery to repair the damage caused, said: ‘I wanted to get some Happy Meals and some cheeseburgers and that was a very unhappy day for me.’', 'The incident began when Price used the restaurant’s drive-thru to order some food – only to then discover she’d been given the wrong thing.', 'Price went back in to the restaurant to complain, but lost patience after being left unattended for 23 minutes.', 'She then hurled the bags of food at the worker, only for the manager to hit back with an airborne blender, which struck Price’s face so hard she was knocked to the ground.', 'Price told WPBF: ‘It’s like, you’re directly ignoring me, so what choice do I have? I don’t have to put up with this.', '‘So, I went and got the food, I want my money back and that’s kind of where it all goes from there.’', 'Asked if she regretted hurling the blender, Price added: ‘I mean, I definitely don’t feel like there would have been a different result.', '‘I feel like even if we would have just went verbal back and forth that it still would’ve escalated to something else.’', 'The injured customer’s lawyer has now filed a civil lawsuit against McDonald’s.', 'A spokesman for the restaurant said: ‘The safety of our customers and employees is of utmost importance to us.', '‘We are looking into this matter and will take the appropriate steps once our investigation is complete.’
header.socioLingVar: Gender - General,Age - Youngsters,Ethnicity - Black,Ethnicity - General,Age - Over 65s

Really sad seeing the comments here.The situation:"Britany Price threw food at a McDonald’s worker after being made to wait 25 minutes for a refund"Appropriate response: wipe off food, give refund, or just get her out of the store.But apparently this was an acceptable resolution: "McDonald’s customer was left with a shattered cheekbone and nose after a restaurant manager hurled a huge blender at her face."With today's standards the old films of the day with food fights wouldn't exist.Back in the day people would push a pile of cream in someone's face on TV for lols. If anyone did that now the person who did it would just end up getting smashed in the face with a brick 🤔😞

commentThread.commentText: She deserves what she got. Acts like a typical angry black women and acts like none of it was her fault. She probably just sat there and didn't bother actually trying to get the attention of staff. As for the blender, I couldn't help but laugh. McDonald's employees have some of the worst jobs in the world, and cows like her throwing food just makes that worse
I mean if you do something like that u should expect it back
She dindu nuffin.
There's more important things to get annoyed about than a McDonalds order.

I'd be interested in them releasing the actual footage of the 30 minutes wait. Since as it stands, she could have stood their without even trying to speak to the staff or that the timeframe is exaggerated.

I see there's the usual bile from keyboard warriors that she deserved it just because she disturbed a workplace. How would you like it your child had their face smashed just because they threw food at someone? I bet you'd feel different then. She was quite right to abandon her order after being kept waiting. I often abandon shopping where I am standing if the checkout staff are too busy gossiping or fooling around or generally just wasting time or not doing their job. Why should I reward them with my custom if they want to waste my time like that? The only thing this woman did wrong was throw food at them, but the staff should've left it for the police to deal with instead of taking the law into their own hands. And the people in these comments should be arrested for inciting violence.
